Requests.EmailCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Accounts WHERE Email = @Email
Requests.AddNewUser: INSERT INTO Accounts (AccountId, AccountName, Email, PasswordHash) VALUES (@AccountId, @AccountName, @Email, @PasswordHash)
Requests.ResetPassword: UPDATE Accounts SET PasswordHash = @PasswordHash WHERE Email = @Email
Requests.Login: SELECT AccountId FROM Accounts WHERE Email = @Email AND PasswordHash = @PasswordHash;
Requests.GetAccountInformation: SELECT AccountName, Email FROM Accounts WHERE AccountId = @AccountId
Requests.GetOrders: SELECT OrderId, OrderDate, CustomerId, PhoneNumber, Country, Region, District, City, Village, Street, HouseNumber, ApartmentNumber, OrderText, DeliveryType, OrderStatus FROM AcceptedOrders WHERE CustomerId = @AccountId
Requests.ChangeName: UPDATE Accounts SET AccountName = @NewName WHERE AccountName = @OldName AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM Accounts WHERE AccountName = @NewName)
Requests.ChangeEmail: UPDATE Accounts SET Email = @NewEmail WHERE Email = @OldEmail AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM Accounts WHERE Email = @NewEmail)
Requests.ChangePassword: UPDATE Accounts SET PasswordHash = @NewPasswordHash WHERE PasswordHash = @OldPasswordHash
Requests.DeleteAccount: DELETE FROM Accounts WHERE AccountId = @AccountId; DELETE FROM AcceptedOrders WHERE CustomerId = @AccountId;
